sense.def:
To pay someone a compliment
pomeni nekomu reči kaj lepega o njem samem.

seg.quote: He had just been paid a great compliment.

sense.def:
To compliment someone
pomeni nekoga pohvaliti ali mu povedati, kako zelo nam je všeč tisto, kar ima ali kar je storil.

seg.quote: He complimented Morris on his new car.

sense.def:
Compliments
so besede, s katerimi izražamo dobre želje ali spoštovanje;

seg.quote: The Secretary of State presents his compliments.
